title: Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description:
Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
Description: When attempting to set the color to orange, it fails to apply the desired color.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color to orange.

Observed Behavior (OB):
Color orange is not applied as expected.

Expected Behavior (EB):
Preview should show the orange color correctly.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color to orange.
3. Verify if the orange color is correctly displayed in the preview.
